result.name: section-96-approvals-information
result.notes: We determine which qualifications should be approved for delivery and funding in schools and colleges up to age 19.  This information is held in an Access data base.  It is also held elsewhere (OFQUAL register, Learning Aim Reference Application), the EFA holds this data for their own use.

organization.name: education-funding-agency
organization.title: Education and Skills Funding Agency
organization.description:
The ESFA brings together the former responsibilities of the Education Funding Agency (EFA) and Skills Funding Agency (SFA) to create a single agency accountable for funding education and skills for children, young people and adults.

ESFA is an executive agency, sponsored by the Department for Education.

result.title: Section 96 Approvals information

extras.value: This is published on a monthly basis usually the 2nd or 3rd week of each month.
